title: Coração Partido (Corazón Partío) - Ao Vivo
licensing_note: Lyrics via Musixmatch API; translations via Google Translate API; grammar notes auto-generated placeholders.

lines.text: Não tem jeito meu compadre, 'vambora
lines.translation: There's no way around it, my friend, let's go!
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Não tem jeito meu compadre, 'vambora' → 'There's no way around it, my friend, let's go!'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Ela vacilou comigo, e nós 'tamo aí, tudo certo
lines.translation: She hesitated with me, but we're still here, everything's alright.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Ela vacilou comigo, e nós 'tamo aí, tudo certo' → 'She hesitated with me, but we're still here, everything's alright.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Eu tentei ficar com você
lines.translation: I tried to stay with you.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Eu tentei ficar com você' → 'I tried to stay with you.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Eu lutei, insisti, persisti, mas você só brincou
lines.translation: I fought, I insisted, I persisted, but you just played games.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Eu lutei, insisti, persisti, mas você só brincou' → 'I fought, I insisted, I persisted, but you just played games.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Sempre me levou na brincadeira
lines.translation: He always took me in stride.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Sempre me levou na brincadeira' → 'He always took me in stride.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: E preferiu a vida de solteira
lines.translation: And she preferred the single life.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'E preferiu a vida de solteira' → 'And she preferred the single life.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Vida de balada, vida de revoada
lines.translation: Party life, flock life
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Vida de balada, vida de revoada' → 'Party life, flock life'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Agora vem se arrepender
lines.translation: Now you'll regret it.
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Agora vem se arrepender' → 'Now you'll regret it.'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Se você me amava
lines.translation: If you loved me
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Se você me amava' → 'If you loved me'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Por que me machucou?
lines.translation: Why did you hurt me?
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Por que me machucou?' → 'Why did you hurt me?'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Se me amava, cê foi me trair por quê?
lines.translation: If you loved me, why did you betray me?
lines.grammar: Portuguese line: Note verb conjugations, nasal vowels, and pronoun placement with clitics/enclisis. Key phrase: 'Se me amava, cê foi me trair por quê?' → 'If you loved me, why did you betray me?'. Mention tense/person endings and any idiomatic chunk the learner should memorize.

lines.text: Eu não vou negar que ainda te amo
